snippet: Japanese players have agreed to take part in the 2013 World Baseball Classic, backing off a threat to boycott the event because of a dispute over the way tournament money is shared.
abstract: Japanese players agree to take part in the 2013 World Baseball Classic, backing off a threat to boycott the event because of a dispute over the way tournament money is shared.
lead_paragraph: Japanese players have agreed to take part in the 2013 World Baseball Classic, backing off a threat to boycott the event because of a dispute over the way tournament money is shared.

headline.seo: Japan Baseball Players Back Off Boycott Threat
headline.main: Japan Baseball Players Back Off Boycott Threat
